title: Why the US is expected to cut interest rates
description: The Federal Reserve is expected to make its first cut to interest rates since 2024.
content:
It's finally happening.
After months of economic debate and mounting attacks from US President Donald Trump, the US central bank is poised to cut interest rates on Wednesday.

title: One in four UK driving tests taken in automatic cars
description: The UK's 2030 ban on the sale of new petrol and diesel cars is said to be driving the trend.
content:
One in four driving tests in Great Britain are being taken in automatic cars, according to new data, as drivers opt for more electric vehicles (EVs) and shy away from manual gearboxes.
Figures from the Driver and Vehicle Standards Agency (DVSA) show ... [2121 chars]

title: Gabriel Martinelli’s instant impact gives Arsenal opening win at Athletic Bilbao
description: Gabriel Martinelli scored less than a minute after coming on then set up Leandro Trossard as Arsenal won 2-0 at Athletic Bilbao
content: “Impactors,” Mikel Arteta called them, and Gabriel Martinelli made quite an impact at San Mamés. “Sometimes you just need a second to change the history of a football club,” the Arsenal manager said last spring – and although describing the goal that... [4471 chars]

title: SBS resists calls to join EU boycott of Eurovision 2026 if Israel allowed to compete
description: Israeli media had reported nation had been asked to step aside or compete under a neutral symbol due to controversies over Gaza war
content:
SBS has indicated it will not follow the lead of a growing number of European Union countries and boycott next year’s Eurovision song contest if Israel is permitted to compete.
The decision on Israel’s inclusion will be made by the contest’s governin... [4123 chars]

title: ‘Heartbroken isn’t the word’: Ricky Hatton’s son Campbell pays emotional tribute to his father
description: Ricky Hatton’s son Campbell has paid tribute to his father following his death at the age of 46
content:
Ricky Hatton’s son Campbell has paid an emotional tribute in his first public comments since his father’s death.
